Articles.Content:
I made this topic to remedy my horrible creativity/patience when drawing.

Step 1: Request an emblem. You can set any criteria you want.

Step 2: Someone who is a better artist than you will (hopefully) create and post their work.

Step 3: ???

Step 4: Profit! In the form of badass emblems to post in Mission Reports!

 

Now, my request is an emblem for a manned research station very close to Kerbol (heat shields and all) called Helios. Good luck!

Edited January 16, 2016 by Iago
